title: Window Function
description:
WINDOW function tests whether the input value is within the limits deï¿¾fned by the LOW and HIGH.
WINDOW is exactly TRUE if IN < HIGH and IN > LOW.
name: WINDOW

input.name: low
input.description: The lower boundary of the input range.

input.name: in
input.description: The input value to be evaluated.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper boundary of the input range.

return_value.description: Returns true if the input value is within the specified range, false otherwise.
